edu.cwru.sepia.agent

Class SimpleAgent1

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cwru.sepia.agent.Agent
      • edu.cwru.sepia.agent.SimpleAgent1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SimpleAgent1
extends Agent
    A simple agent that makes all its units move in random directions if they are not attacking. Will attack any enemy within sight range.
    Author:
    Tim
    See Also:
